arts.ttl: Eredivisie: PSV Eindhoven go eight points clear as Van Persie battles relegation
arts.sum: PSV Eindhoven extended their lead at the top of the Eredivisie with a 2-1 away win over rivals AZ Alkmaar. Luuk de Jong and Noa Lang put the visitors two goals ahead after 21 minutes, although Denso Kasius’ late goal made for a nervy finish to the encounter. Peter Bosz’ side are now eight points […] The post Eredivisie: PSV Eindhoven go eight points clear as Van Persie battles relegation first appeared on The Football Faithful.
